FlatBuffers release 2.0.0

These binaries were downlaoded from:
https://github.com/google/flatbuffers/releases/tag/v2.0.0


TO UPDATE TO LATER VERSION/RELEASE:


Find the desired release on git hub and download the following:
	Mac.flatc.binary.zip
	Windows.flatc.binary.zip
	Source code.zip


Unzip the to binary files into the current directory and run the following permission commands:
	chmod a+x flatc
	chmod a+x flatc.exe

Unzip the contents of the Source Code zip and copy the contents of the zip
	from unzipped directory:
		net/FlatBuffers/
	to package directory:
		Runtime/Parameters/ThirdParty/FlatBuffers/
